fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Defend a player from not being British tonight. All of the O's in their rolecard have a U placed after them, and all the S's are replaced with C's. All of the R's and T's are removed. The host must interpret their new rolecard.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When you're visited, you will defend a player from not being offered a cup of tea, which is actually poisoned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose the game, mate.
